page.title: 14HORSE RIDING
page.content: {Recreation Horse Riding -------------------------------------- Some individuals in the area have their own horses which they ride for pleasure along the country lanes. At Thurlby Moor, a small horse community has grown up. A total of 14 people live here with a{horse population of 31. One family rely on horses for their sole income. They buy horses, train and resel them. The husband is also a professional show jumper. Another household has seven horses which are used for hunting and showing. Both these establishments {employ}people to look after the horses and give{riding}lessons to interested people. They also have ponies for children to ride. --------------------------------------
